div.h2: AllergyIntolerance Substance/Product, Condition and Negation Codes

div.p: This value set includes concept codes for specific substances/pharmaceutical products, allergy or intolerance conditions, and negation/exclusion codes to specify the absence of specific types of allergies or intolerances.
